resources.name: idtracker.ai
resources.description: Open-source multi-animal tracking software that can identify and track up to 100 unmarked animals in video, maintaining individual identities throughout the recording.

resources.name: SimBA - Simple Behavioral Analysis
resources.description: Open-source pipeline and GUI for developing supervised behavioral classifiers. Supports DLC, DeepPoseKit, SLEAP, MARS and others.

resources.name: Bonsai
resources.description: Visual programming language for synchronizing and processing heterogeneous data streams in real time

resources.name: LabStreamingLayer (LSL)
resources.description: Middleware framework for streaming and synchronizing multiple data sources (e.g. EEG, motion tracking, video, etc.) over a network.

resources.name: Open Ephys
resources.description: Open-source platform for electrophysiology hardware and software.

resources.name: CEBRA: Consistent EmBeddings of high-dimensional Recordings using Auxiliary variables
resources.description: Machine-learning method that can be used to compress time series in a way that reveals otherwise hidden structures in the variability of the data
